oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and single crystal X-ray structure of N,N '-bis(diphenylphosphino)piperazine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
GEORGE, PP
MAGUE, JT
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: transition-metal chemistry
molecular-structures
complexes
ligands
palladium(ii)
phosphazene
catalysts
bis(phosphines)
piperazine derivative
x-ray structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reaction of piperazine with chlorodiphenylphosphine in toluene under refluxing conditions yields Ph2PN(C4H8)NPPh2 in quantitative yield. The structure is confirmed by single crystal X-ray diffraction studies.
